column5: Can anyboy reccomend a good heavy duty rod holders for trolling that are clamp ons? Thanks.
downeast salty s-10.  they will outlast your boat.
There are some called salty 2 from Downeaster. Musky guys trust them for their expensive gear so they gotta be good.

Yes, S-10's are probably the best there is but be careful. They are clamp-ons but depending on the type of boat you have, you may need make or buy mounts for them. The clamps only open about 3 inches or so.

try tite-lok rod holders good all round rod holder the one you want is sure set with c-mount. check cabelas for a picture of them. lebaron sell them, as well as bass pro shop. happy fishing, see you on the water, walleyedreamer
You might consider the scootty's, They aren't clamp on but the holder comes off and leaves the bolt on mount.
Mattyk the salty is by far the best clamp on rod holder out on the market .Quick release user freindly solid metal no plastic .Only works with narrow gunwales.Mike
